title: Bale picking machine. pick up bales fast and easily.

subtasks: Sit in the tractor seat
Operate the steering wheel to steer the tractor
Use pedals to control speed and direction
Approach the hay pile with tractor
Attach hay gatherer or loader to the front of the tractor
Drive the tractor to the hay pile, positioning it correctly
Lower the loader to pick up hay
Drive the truck with hay to farm storage area
Align the truck with the storage structure
Open the truck bed to access the hay
Use a implement such as a pitchfork or hay auger to unload hay onto the storage structure

tasks.task: Attach a plow to the tractor
subtasks: Lower the plow to the ground
Drive the tractor and plow across a field
Raise the plow at the end of the field

tasks.task: Check and adjust the depth of the plow
subtasks: Stop the tractor
Examine the plow to ensure it is at the correct depth
Make adjustments by hand or via lever if needed
Attach the cultivator to the tractor
Start the cultivator
Control the cultivator from the tractor seat while moving through fields
Set the fertilizers in the cultivator
Determine the correct diffusion
Release the fertilizer as perched

tasks.task: Evaluate the condition of a cornfield
subtasks: Walk through the cornfield
Look for signs of pests, diseases, or lodging
Note the overall health and growth stage
Check the pesticide applicator
Drive the tractor through the field
Release the pesticide from the applicator
Check the condition of the harness
Tighten or adjust as necessary
